name: Crusade to Die
description:
Made in 2 days for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 with the theme Roll of the Dice

HOW TO PLAY

Lock onto tiles and move them around to help a little bard avoid skeletons and collect coins. Grab D6 to generate new tiles and D4 to reroll tiles. Getting hit will lose you tiles

WASD - Move cursor

Space - Lock/unlock cursor
